title: The Hunt for Red October
description: When a Soviet nuclear sub headed toward American waters drops off U.S. scanners, the Yanks and CIA analyst Jack Ryan scramble to respond.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a friendly, simpleminded man, finds himself in the middle of nearly every major event of the 1960s and '70s.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: When five unacquainted crooks are hauled into a police station to appear in a criminal lineup, they decide to pull off a heist together.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
description: Jack Lemmon, Al Pacino, Ed Harris and Alan Arkin star as Chicago real estate salesmen vying for the best leads at a firm that sells resort properties.

title: Fargo
description: When a car dealer conspires with dim-bulb criminals to kidnap his wife for a hefty ransom, a folksy -- and pregnant -- police chief is on the case.

title: Skyfall
description: When a serious menace threatens MI6, James Bond is on the case -- putting aside his own life and personal issues to hunt and destroy the perpetrators.

title: Gladiator
description: Tapped for the throne after the death of the emperor, a Roman general instead finds himself condemned to die by the late ruler's power-hungry son.

title: Kill Bill, Vol. 1
description: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle. But she lives -- and plots her vengeance.

title: Terminator 2
description: A reprogrammed Terminator arrives from the future to protect young John Connor from a relentless shape-shifting cyborg in this sequel to Terminator.

title: 13 Assassins
description: To stop a tyrant from murdering and exploiting innocent civilians, 13 samurai warriors unite and prepare to assassinate the evildoer.

title: Apocalypse Now Redux
description: The reedit of this Vietnam War epic that follows an Army captain's search for a renegade colonel features new footage and a fade-to-black ending.

title: Star Trek II
description: Kirk assists Spock in a training mission for Starfleet cadets. But the novice crew is put to the test when they must confront escaped villain Khan.

title: Jack Reacher
description: When an ex-military cop investigates a sniper charged with five homicides, he's drawn into a dangerous cat-and-mouse game in this exciting thriller.
